import React, { useRef } from 'react' import {AiFillCopy} from 'react-icons/ai' const CenterDetails = ({name,address,pincode,vaccine,date}) =>{ let pinCodeRef = useRef(); return(

AVAILABLE

Center Name = {name}
Address = {address}
Pin code = {pincode}

) } export default CenterDetails
